channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Multi-Patient Medical; INC#1665; 08:45PM; 20000 W Sesnon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48FmL3V; #PorterRanch; After assessing 6 high-school-aged patients who ingested an unknown substance, 5 were transported to area hospitals by LAFD ambulances, with non-life-threatening medical complaints. LAPD Inc #2415. Nothing further.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E28 E8 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA18 RA70 RA73 RA75 RA84 RA87 RA96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Explosion; INC#1726; 08:16PM; 2328 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZMDgH9; #DowntownLA; Two-story row of commercials with structural damage, and signs of a previous explosion. No active fire. No further explosions. No current escalating or off-site hazard. No injuries. LAFD Hazardous Materials specialists are on scene to assess the scene, investigate, and determine a safe course of action. Since there is no escalating hazard, firefighters will slow down, isolate the area, and proceed in a slow and methodical manner, with caution.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E14 E17 E21 E221 E9 EM1 RA14 RA17 SO1 SQ21 T21 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Medical; INC#1665; 07:44PM; 20000 W Sesnon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48FmL3V; #PorterRanch; Six juveniles with medical complaints, after ingesting an unknown substance. Firefighter/paramedics are completing assessments and providing initial treatments on scene.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E28 E8 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA18 RA70 RA75 RA84 RA87 RA96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1288; 04:44PM; 4723 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LN5Tyg; #VermontSquare; It took 40 firefighters 19 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish flames in one unit on the second floor of a two-story residential-over-commercial. Crews performed a coordinated vertical ventilation with interior fire attack to protect the adjacent units and achieve rapid extinguishment. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E226 E266 E294 E34 E46 E94 RA46 RA66 SQ21 T26 T66 T94; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1288; 04:25PM; 4723 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LN5Tyg; #VermontSquare; Two-story residential-over-commercial with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E226 E266 E294 E34 E46 E94 RA46 RA66 SQ21 T26 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 10/06/2023 INC#1179

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1179; 03:53PM; 531 N Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48KdOq4; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters responded to a 7,528 square-foot two-story apartment building built in 1926, to find fire in one unit and the attic. Crews coordinated occupant evacuations, while setting up for simultaneous vertical ventilation (cutting holes in the roof for smoke to escape) and interior fire attack. One pediatric female (approx 7 years old) was transported after being exposed to smoke inside the building. Ultimately, it took 58 firefighters 29 minutes to extinguish the flames, keeping it from spreading into adjacent units. No other injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E210 E3 E4 E95 EM1 EM11 EM5 HR703 PI2 RA14 RA20 RA3 RA4 RA810 SQ21 SQ95 T1 T10 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1179; 03:24PM; 531 N Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48KdOq4; #BoyleHeights; Two-story center hallway apartment building with smoke showing from the attic. Offensive mode.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E210 E3 E4 E95 EM1 EM11 HR703 RA3 RA4 RA810 SQ21 SQ95 T1 T10 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0824; 12:12PM; 1432 E 25th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48A6mO2; Central-Alameda; LAFD responded to a two-story vacant church building with light smoke showing. Crews made entry and located a small fire, burning contents only (no structural members of the building). It took 38 firefighters 18 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 E14 E17 E209 E21 E221 E9 EM1 RA17 RA815 SO1 SQ21 T21 T9; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0928; 01:59PM; 250 W 81st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48ziqiN; #Florence; The total number of vehicles involved in the collision has been updated to *3 vehicles* involved. A total of 7 patients transported to area hospitals. Three patients in critical condition (40M, 36F, and 28M) and four patients in fair condition (24F, 5F, 4F, and 5-month-old female). Nothing further.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E209 E21 E266 E57 EM1 EM18 EM4 RA209 RA21 RA246 RA43 RA810 RA811 RA813 RA857 RA864 RA866 T66; CH4; 13; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire - Now Stopped; INC#0969; 01:32PM; 11452 W Sheldon St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LKYuPS; #ShadowHills; Approximately 1/2-acre of light/medium brush in the Hansen Dam area. Crews are initiating a fire attack by ground and air. It took 47 firefighters 20 minutes surround the final one-acre burn footprint, stopping all forward progress. Crews will remain on scene to improve containment lines and cool all hot spots within the one-acre burn area ("mop up" operations). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E24 E274 E289 E290 E298 E77 E89 E90 E91 E98 EM14 FR91 H1 H3 H7 HA1 HA3 HA7 RA90 T74 T89 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange
